Annotations.Annotation: The American Community Survey (ACS) is conducted by the US Census and sent to a portion of the population every year.

Row.Value: Income In The Past 12 Months Below Poverty Level
Income In The Past 12 Months At Or Above Poverty Level

CalculatedMember.name: Poverty by Work Experience
CalculatedMember.Formula: CASE WHEN [Geography].[Tract].Level is [Geography].[Tract].[State] THEN [Measures].[mea_t] WHEN [Geography].[Tract].Level is [Geography].[Tract].[County] THEN [Measures].[mea_t] WHEN [Geography].[Tract].Level is [Geography].[Tract].[Tract] THEN [Measures].[mea_t] WHEN [Geography].[Place].Level is [Geography].[Place].[State] THEN [Measures].[mea_place] WHEN [Geography].[Place].Level is [Geography].[Place].[Place] THEN [Measures].[mea_place] WHEN [Geography].[Zip].Level is [Geography].[Zip].[Zip] THEN [Measures].[mea_zip] WHEN [Geography].[County].Level is [Geography].[County].[State] THEN [Measures].[mea_county] WHEN [Geography].[County].Level is [Geography].[County].[County] THEN [Measures].[mea_county] WHEN [Geography].[State].Level is [Geography].[State].[State] THEN [Measures].[mea_state] WHEN [Geography].[Nation].Level is [Geography].[Nation].[Nation] THEN [Measures].[mea_nation] WHEN [Geography].[Puma].Level is [Geography].[Puma].[State] THEN [Measures].[mea_puma] WHEN [Geography].[Puma].Level is [Geography].[Puma].[Puma] THEN [Measures].[mea_puma] WHEN [Geography].[Msa].Level is [Geography].[Msa].[Msa] THEN [Measures].[mea_msa] WHEN [Geography].[County Subdivision].Level is [Geography].[County Subdivision].[State] THEN [Measures].[mea_county_subdivision] WHEN [Geography].[County Subdivision].Level is [Geography].[County Subdivision].[County] THEN [Measures].[mea_county_subdivision] WHEN [Geography].[County Subdivision].Level is [Geography].[County Subdivision].[County Subdivision] THEN [Measures].[mea_county_subdivision] WHEN 1 = 1 THEN [Measures].[mea_nation] END

CalculatedMember.name: Poverty by Work Experience Moe
CalculatedMember.Formula: CASE WHEN [Geography].[Tract].Level is [Geography].[Tract].[State] THEN [Measures].[moe_t] WHEN [Geography].[Tract].Level is [Geography].[Tract].[County] THEN [Measures].[moe_t] WHEN [Geography].[Tract].Level is [Geography].[Tract].[Tract] THEN [Measures].[moe_t] WHEN [Geography].[Place].Level is [Geography].[Place].[State] THEN [Measures].[moe_place] WHEN [Geography].[Place].Level is [Geography].[Place].[Place] THEN [Measures].[moe_place] WHEN [Geography].[Zip].Level is [Geography].[Zip].[Zip] THEN [Measures].[moe_zip] WHEN [Geography].[County].Level is [Geography].[County].[State] THEN [Measures].[moe_county] WHEN [Geography].[County].Level is [Geography].[County].[County] THEN [Measures].[moe_county] WHEN [Geography].[State].Level is [Geography].[State].[State] THEN [Measures].[moe_state] WHEN [Geography].[Nation].Level is [Geography].[Nation].[Nation] THEN [Measures].[moe_nation] WHEN [Geography].[Puma].Level is [Geography].[Puma].[State] THEN [Measures].[moe_puma] WHEN [Geography].[Puma].Level is [Geography].[Puma].[Puma] THEN [Measures].[moe_puma] WHEN [Geography].[Msa].Level is [Geography].[Msa].[Msa] THEN [Measures].[moe_msa] WHEN [Geography].[County Subdivision].Level is [Geography].[County Subdivision].[State] THEN [Measures].[moe_county_subdivision] WHEN [Geography].[County Subdivision].Level is [Geography].[County Subdivision].[County] THEN [Measures].[moe_county_subdivision] WHEN [Geography].[County Subdivision].Level is [Geography].[County Subdivision].[County Subdivision] THEN [Measures].[moe_county_subdivision] WHEN 1 = 1 THEN [Measures].[moe_nation] END
